snippet.title: Hidden Pass - a Tactical Turn-Based RPG. Our new combat teaser trailer!
snippet.description:
Chart a course for mystical adventure in this fusion of Tactical Turn-Based RPG and 4X Strategy. Build a team of skyfaring heroes, wield techno-magical devices and construct automatons as you explore uncharted sky-islands rich in secrets and powerful, dangerous Elyrium crystals.

Here is the showcase of our combat gameplay. Some abilities, characters and monsters in a fast combination. 

I hope you will enjoy it. 

Our social links:
-Kickstarter, we plan to start our campaign at the beginning of May 2024
(https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ggstudiopw/hidden-pass-tactical-turn-based-rpg-with-base-management?ref=56uuls)
-Discord to be more up-to-date and involved ( https://discord.gg/GuhRb9N9Dq)
-Twitter (https://twitter.com/GGstudiodev)
-Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/2430170/Hidden_Pass/?utm_source=youtu)
